ques: The _________ river flowed through the forest.
He has a _________ talent for singing and often performs at local events.
His _________ decision led to unintended consequences.
The _________ porcelain vase was displayed in a glass cabinet.
Yoga helps improve your body's _________ and strength.
The road ahead was long and _________.
The view from the mountaintop was absolutely _________.
The ink from the marker left a _________ mark on the paper.
The _________ quality of the product made it stand out.
The page was _________; there was nothing written on it.
Her _________ advice helped him make the right choice.
He's just an _________ photographer, but he takes stunning photos.
His shirt was _________ and hung loosely on his frame.
The _________ winter weather made it difficult to go outside.
She has _________ hair that doesn't curl easily.
The _________ connection caused the pipe to leak.
The material was _________ and could be stretched easily.
His performance in the game was _________; he scored five goals.
The performance was so good that it was hard to believe it was done by an _________.
The _________ support for the charity's cause was overwhelming.
Her _________ criticism hurt his feelings.
She drew a _________ expression on her face when asked the question.
She had a _________ reaction to the medication.
They made a _________ decision to save money for the future.
He decided to make his temporary tattoo _________.
The _________ action of the firefighters saved the building.
His knowledge of the subject was _________ to others in the class.
Her _________ touch was needed to repair the fragile artifact.
The plan was _________ and well-thought-out.
They organized an _________ singing competition for fun.
The chef prepared an _________ meal that delighted the guests.
She was a _________ advocate for environmental conservation.
The _________ flavor of the dish required precise cooking techniques.
The _________ canvas was ready for the artist to create a masterpiece.
She preferred wearing _________, comfortable clothing.
The job offered a _________ position with benefits.
The punishment for the crime was _________ and severe.
It's important not to make _________ judgments without thinking.
She made a _________ decision to change her career path.
They offered _________ customer service and support.
She had a _________ schedule that allowed for changes and adaptations.
He prefers to keep things _________ and simple.
His _________ approach to problem-solving was an asset to the team.
The movie we watched last night was truly _________; it had amazing special effects.
The _________ sand shifted with the wind.
She wanted to make the changes _________ and lasting.
The _________ response to the emergency situation was crucial.
The _________ behavior of the driver caused an accident.
The computer screen remained _________ after the power outage.
The _________ expressions of discontent were heard at the meeting.
She had a _________ way of handling difficult situations.
Despite being an _________, he played the piano beautifully.
The teacher drew a _________ line on the chalkboard.
His _________ approach to problem-solving was effective.
The _________ lighting in the room revealed every flaw.
The team's performance was deemed _________ by the judges.
The animal moved with _________ agility and grace.
They regretted their _________ words spoken in anger.
Her _________ painting captured the beauty of nature.
Their _________ opinions on the matter were clear.
The artist's work is now part of the _________ collection at the museum.
He had a _________ tone when addressing the issue.
She offered _________ solutions to the complex problem.
The _________ balance of the ecosystem needed to be preserved.
The knot came _________, and the package fell open.
She had an _________ adventure while traveling in a foreign country.
The athlete ran in a _________ line to the finish.
The _________ branches of the tree swayed in the wind.
He handed in a _________ sheet of paper with no answers.
She had a _________ understanding of the topic.
